activity.title: coronasafe/care_fe#7253
activity.text:
@nihal467 
I think "Dummy Facility 40" is not present causing tests to fail 
![image](https://github.com/coronasafe/care_fe/assets/111575806/fc6739a1-c762-4142-b23c-d11f53ebca00)
![Screenshot from 2024-02-28 02-35-59](https://github.com/coronasafe/care_fe/assets/111575806/34c26716-d863-458f-9d3c-de7ea7bd2549)

https://github.com/coronasafe/care_fe/blob/bda15df327003b9bf741edc004fe1eb5d111f463/cypress/e2e/patient_spec/patient_consultation.cy.ts#L22
I ran tests locally by changing "Dummy Facility 40" to "James" and able to pass all the tests 
![Screenshot from 2024-02-28 02-49-02](https://github.com/coronasafe/care_fe/assets/111575806/208745ed-03c7-4286-a467-09a56ea52c5a)

activity.title: coronasafe/care_fe#7253
activity.text:
@nihal467 
![image](https://github.com/coronasafe/care_fe/assets/111575806/6be159a3-eb4c-47ec-bba0-300f9d6c4b58)
![image](https://github.com/coronasafe/care_fe/assets/111575806/9beb1aea-63a4-4a23-afca-f48ac5e0e835)
![image](https://github.com/coronasafe/care_fe/assets/111575806/79ad13e7-7d3e-45c6-9d30-d8d4b5307663)

I think Dummy Facility 40 is not present and creating tests to fail 

after running tests locally by changing Dummy Facility 40 to James , I was able to pass all tests  
![image](https://github.com/coronasafe/care_fe/assets/111575806/6b70e6a6-b10a-4b31-a3d2-f7e5890fde60)


reference https://github.com/coronasafe/care_fe/blob/bda15df327003b9bf741edc004fe1eb5d111f463/cypress/e2e/patient_spec/patient_consultation.cy.ts#L22

http://localhost:4000/facility/64c2be92-47fd-47c3-9d3d-7891245f4611/patient/a4b86382-8998-4d66-a448-dbd2ce40da6b/consultation/ab765f7b-79a4-4e49-be88-2cdd63c834ca/feed
